content.text:
# Draft:List of Android antivirus software

The following is a list of notable antivirus applications available for the Android operating system.
* Avast Antivirus: Mobile security app developed by Avast Software, offering virus scanning and privacy protection.
* AVG AntiVirus: Android security app from AVG Technologies providing malware protection and performance tools.
* Bitdefender Mobile Security: Android antivirus app by Bitdefender offering real-time protection and web security.
* Kaspersky Mobile Security: Mobile antivirus and anti-theft app developed by Kaspersky Lab.
* Malwarebytes (software): Anti-malware software available for Android as well as Windows and other platforms.
* Trend Micro Mobile Security: Mobile protection app from Trend Micro offering antivirus and privacy scanning.
* F-Secure Mobile Security: Mobile antivirus by F-Secure offering browsing protection and parental controls.
* Comodo Mobile Security: Android antivirus suite by Comodo group providing real-time malware protection.
* Dr.Web: Antivirus software suite developed by Doctor Web, with mobile (Android) editions among its offerings.
* 360 Security: Android optimization and antivirus app developed by Qihoo 360, combining cleaning and protection tools.
See also
* List of Windows antivirus software
* List of macOS antivirus software
* Comparison of antivirus software
* Antivirus software
